object.name: feedback
object.property: Provide feedback regarding any of the Docent features.

<model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="feedback_submitted_by" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Who submitted this feedback.</description> <title>Feedback Submitted By</title> </field> <field name="feedback_text" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Enter a full description of the comment, suggestion, compliment or complaint.</description> <title>Feedback Text</title> </field> <field name="feedback_file" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobFile"> <description>Attach any files that may help.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Feedback File</title> </field> <field name="do_you_want_feedback" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>Would you like to hear back from us?</description> <required>False</required> <title>Do you want feedback?</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> </schema> </model>
